# SlugShade - LLM Context File

SlugShade is an npm package for deterministic slug generation with Unicode-first behavior.

Core points:
- Default output keeps Unicode letters/numbers from non-Latin scripts.
- ASCII mode transliterates where possible and hex-encodes unknown scripts (`u<hex>`).
- `slugDetailed()` returns a transformation trace for debugging and AI workflows.
- `slugAsync()` takes a user-provided AI function; final output is always re-sanitized deterministically.
- No runtime dependencies.

Public API:
- slug(input, options?) => string
- slugDetailed(input, options?) => { slug, tokens, warnings, steps }
- slugAsync(input, { ...options, ai }) => Promise<string>
- createSlugger(defaults) => (input, options?) => string
- uniqueSlug(base, isTaken, opts?) => string
- presets.safe / presets.cyber / presets.unicode
